posts.post_content: I know it's a long shot but does anyone know someone with a Plank they'll sell?  Looking for a 3-4  [url]dmb102175@comcast.net[/url]

Hey Doug,

There's one on ebay right now. Not sure how low he'd go, but might be worth a shot. 

[url]http://www.ebay.com/itm/1909-T206-Sweet-Caporal-Eddie-Plank-PSA-2-Amazing-card-/161022569343?pt=US_Baseball&hash=item257db16b7f[/url]
i saw that one but don't like the paper loss.

Doug,

I have a very high-end '4'.  The image on the card is simply remarkable.  I would consider selling at the right price, but it's not going to be a 'bargain'.  Nonetheless if you'd like scans feel free to email me.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
